text1.text: You can edit these texts under /Content/Saves/QTs.json xD

text3.text: Go to the Stand to enter Building mode

text4.text: Press C to switch back from Camera to Character

text7.text: Dont mind the wonky physics, i just set the mass extremely low :)

text8.text: Tab to switch Character and Cabin

text11.text: You can control joints after hitting 1 and clicking on one of them

text12.text: Theres also a Sequencer for complex well.. sequences

text13.text: You can't lose stuff from your inventory for this Demo btw

text14.text: Dont judge the the appearance i put this in 10 min together except the code
